actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to expand the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the SUNY National Center for Security and Preparedness.
short_title: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2011

summary.text: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2011 - Requires the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the SUNY (State University of New York) National Center for Security and Preparedness.

titles.title: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2011
A bill to expand the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the SUNY National Center for Security and Preparedness.
